Subject: The Hoxton on Google Maps

Key quotes:
Positive: "What a wonderful experience, can’t recommend this hotel highly enough.  The front desk staff is next level friendly and professional.  Special callout for Emmanuel for helping make my stay incredible"
Positive: "Just ate at Lotti’s and what and experience. Honestly can’t ask for more; great food and amazing service. Especially Sam who went above and beyond to help us out!"
Negative: "Not great, not terrible. I would give 2.5 stars if I could. First the bad: don’t believe their “Flexy” policy. It is a marketing scam and not honored. I reviewed the “policy” carefully before booking"
Sample size: n=1200 Google Maps reviews across all locations
Data quality notes: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ High confidence, verified Google Maps reviews from 2024-2025. Large sample size provides statistical significance.
